title: [CLIENT] BLACKSCREEN WHEN I WANT TO JOIN A GAME
body: I downloaded the game today and i wanted to play it but when i was in the launcher and wanted to start the tutorial i only got a blackscreen. Pls could somebody help me ???

replies.body: A black screen can happen if your connection is failing to reach the game server, and failing to download any assets.  You'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and clear up any blocks.  Let me know if you have any questions!

okay i tryed it but it still doesn't work the game starts i get a blackscreen hear the game and thats it :(


now i tryed to change the resulution in the config and it worked :D

Thanks for the clarification!  If you can still hear the game with a blackscreen, that can indicate a driver or hardware problem failing to load up content.  Changing your resolution is good, but you might still run into problems later.  Go over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide in this case just to be sure everything is okay!
